snippet.title: Building My Portfolio Website Using Python Flask
snippet.description:
Building My Portfolio Website Using Python Flask

Get a .TECH domain 90% off:
https://get.tech/now?coupon=kalle&utm_source=Inf&utm_medium=Podcast&utm_campaign=June%20Thrust&utm_term=KalleHallden

"Clean Code Friday"
If you want to receive one short email from me every week, where I go through a few of the most useful things I have explored and discovered this week. Things like; favourite apps, articles, podcasts, books, coding tips and tricks. Then feel free to join https://kalletech.com/clean-code-friday/

In this video I build my personal website http://www.kallehallden.tech which will be my new portfolio website.
I built this in one week using python and flask but actually ended up mostly just using HTML and CSS since the design was fairly simple.

If you want to follow my builds and see me build things live then check out my twitch channel: https://www.twitch.tv/kallehallden

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
